content:
Posted: February 5, 2012
												RACE07 is getting old these days, but the 2010 DLC has come out at a very reasonable price. The physic of this game are excellent, so is the actual racing. AI drivers properly fight you for position and with a force feedback steering wheel this game can be very immersive.
